Title: Prohibits providers of health care coverage from requiring behavioral health providers to provide all products offered by the health care plan
Summary: Prohibits providers of health care coverage from requiring behavioral health providers to provide all products offered by the health care plan.
LawCode: Amd §365-m, Soc Serv L; amd §§2511 & 4406-c, Pub Health L; amd §§3217-b & 4325, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, the public health law and the insurance law, in relation to prohibiting a provider of health care coverage from requiring providers of behavioral health services to offer all products offered by the provider of health care coverage
